div.ab:
بسم اللّه الرّحمن الرّحيم
قد فهمت كتابك وقد رددت
إلـ]ـيك العشر دننر دننير فادفعها
إلى] أبي الحسن مع العشرين إردب
قمح وقد رددت إليك القرض
على حاله فإن سألك فأعلمه
أن رسولك أصابني قد دفعت
وأن رسول عبد الخلق جاك
لتطلّقه القمح وحرّق رقعتي
إذا أقرأتها إن شا اللّه
فإن قبل القمح مع الدّننر وألّا
فرّد القمح إلى وليّك وابعث
إلى الدّننر مع أوّل من يخرج إلينا
إن شا اللّه

bi smi ăl lāhi ăr raḥmāni ăr raḥīmi
*** qad fahimtu kitāba ka wa qad radadtu
ʾilay ka ăl ʿašra danānira danānīra fa ĭdfaʿ hā
ʾilà ʾabī ăl ḥasani maʿa ăl ʿišrīna ʾirdabb
qamḥ wa qad radadtu ʾilay ka ăl qarḍa
ʿalà ḥāli hi fa ʾin saʾala ka fa ʾaʿlim hu
ʾanna rasūla ka ʾaṣāba nī qad dafaʿtu
wa ʾanna rasūla ʿabdi ăl ḫāliqi ǧāʾa ka
li tuṭalliqa hu ăl qamḥa wa ḥarriq ruqʿat ī
ʾiḏā ʾaqraʾta hā ʾin šāʾa ăl lāhu
fa ʾin qabila ăl qamḥa maʿa ăd danāniri wa ʾillā
fa ruddi ăl qamḥa ʾilà waliyyi ka wa ĭbʿaṯ
ʾilay ya ăd danānira maʿa ʾawwali man yaḫruǧu ʾilay nā
ʾin šāʾa ăl lāhu

In the Name &c. In the name of God, the Compassionate, the Merciful!
I [already] understood thy letter and I return I understand your letter and I return
[to] thee the ten dînârs. So hand them over to you the ten dinars and do you hand the over
to Abu 'l-Ḥasan with the twenty ardebs to Abu'l Ḥasan with the twenty artabas
of wheat; so I have returned to thee the loan of wheat; so I have returned to you the loan
in its condition; and if he asks thee, then inform him in its condition; and if he asks you, then inform him
that thy messenger found me having already paid, that your messenger found me having already paid,
and that the messenger of ʿAbd al-Khâliq came to thee and that the messenger of ʿAbd al-Khaliq came to you
that thou mightest give him the wheat; and burn my letter that you might give him the wheat; and burn my letter
when thou hast read it, please God. when you have read it, please God.
And if he shall accept the wheat with the dinars - otherwise
return the wheat to thy friend and send return the wheat to your friend and send
the dinars to me with the first person who comes out to us,
if God wills. please God.
